Articles.Content:
The rules of this game are quite simple, really.

1. Attempt to read the invisi-text, and then try to interpret what it means.

2. Do not cheat (i.e select the invisi-text.)

3. You must attempts to read the invisi-text.

4. Invisi-text can be preformed by doing this: [color=#FFFFFF" [font=Times New Roman [size=1 [/size [/font [/color

5. Moderators may not follow rule #2 (to see if somebody tries to derail / chat / do inappropriate stuff), but then if they do, they can't reply.

I will start: I can go to Eeloo and back in one mission.

Edited May 26, 2014 by Souper
you can go to eeloo and back in one mission now i can go........moho is very hot

So, we just post invisible text? What's the point of reading someone's text? The rules should be modified a little.

(I can't see the any of the other invisible messages AT ALL. This puts a new spin on InvisiText.)

**** you ******

This game is too easy to abuse, sorry guys but I think it is covered under rule 2.4

2.4 Language, placement spelling and grammar

All messages must be sent in English unless otherwise indicated. The user should make an effort to place a new thread in the right forum section and must attempt to use proper grammar and spelling in all messages, meaning that txt-speak, 1337-speak and other exclusionary jargons are prohibited.

Especially when it's used to hide profanity.
